q: While using Maven, X builds an integration-test lifecycle phase and clears the test. When Y, a co-worker attempts to build an integration test; Y fails. Which of the following could be a probable cause?

a.option: X has specified appserver paths in a profile, that is specified in the settings.xml.
Y has specified appserver paths in a profile, that is specified in the settings.xml.
X has generated two profiles with different value properties for the same integration.
Y has generated two profiles with different value properties for the same integration.

q: While working with Maven, you want to include a snippet of the source code into your project. What must you do to include the snippet?

a.option: Assign a unique path to the snippet.
Assign a unique ID to the snippet.
